column4: ^QUESTION^  Hi, I love nautilus Spacial view, in particular, the little drop down menu in the statusbar, with the folder tree, BUT I hate that it opens a new window everytime you click a folder. Is it possible to keep the view like that, but prevent it from opening windows?
you can change it to non-spacial view, but I don't know if that's what you want. In Nautilus: Edit -> Preferences -> Behaviour -> "Always open in browser windows"
